metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8559 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Kubernetes kube-apiserver in versions v1.6-v1.15, and versions prior to v1.16.13, v1.17.9 and v1.18.6 are vulnerable to an unvalidated redirect on proxied upgrade requests that could allow an attacker to escalate privileges from a node compromise to a full cluster compromise.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
